hero.title: Find Your Perfect Car
hero.description: Get the best deals from trusted dealers in Quebec. No negotiation needed - just submit your preferences and receive competitive quotes within 24 hours.
hero.partners: Trusted by leading dealerships across Quebec

primaryFeatures.title: Everything you need to get the best deal
primaryFeatures.description: AutoQuote24 streamlines the car buying process with powerful features designed to save you time and money.

bidding.title: Private Bidding System
bidding.description: Dealers compete for your business without seeing each other's bids, ensuring you get the best possible price.

tradeIn.title: Trade-In Valuation
tradeIn.description: Get an instant estimate of your current vehicle's value based on real market data.

communication.title: Secure Communication
communication.description: Chat directly with dealers through our encrypted messaging system once you accept a quote.

secondaryFeatures.title: Advanced Features
secondaryFeatures.description: Powerful tools to make your car buying experience seamless.

1.title: Photo Management
1.description: Upload up to 4 high-quality photos of your trade-in vehicle.

2.title: Balloon Payments
2.description: Calculate and compare different financing options including balloon payments.

3.title: Accessories Selection
3.description: Browse and select from a wide range of manufacturer-approved accessories.

testimonials.title: Loved by car buyers across Quebec
testimonials.description: See what our satisfied customers have to say about their experience with AutoQuote24.

items.content: AutoQuote24 saved me thousands on my new car. The process was incredibly smooth and transparent.
I was skeptical at first, but the private bidding system really works. Got an amazing deal on my dream car.

callToAction.title: Ready to find your perfect car?
callToAction.description: Join thousands of satisfied customers who found their dream car through AutoQuote24.

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that's right for you.

buyer.title: Car Buyer
buyer.description: Everything you need to find your perfect car

1.question: How does the bidding system work?
1.answer: Dealers submit private bids without seeing competitors' offers. You receive the top 3 lowest price quotes within 24 hours.

2.question: Is there a fee to use AutoQuote24?
2.answer: Yes, there is a one-time fee of $40 to submit your vehicle preferences and receive quotes. This helps ensure serious buyers and quality service.
